images.mining.codebook

Class SIFTCodebookMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.codebook.SIFTCodebookMaker

  • public class SIFTCodebookMaker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the logic for calculating codebook vectors for SIFT features.
